body: I've now been a moderator for 2 years, along with Flo (Resepignev). Ask me anything. :}

replies.body:
Wow. That's quite the achievement, congrats! :D

Since you've been a mod for so long, I'm sure you've gone through many different "periods" with the staff team - idk if that's the right word, but you know, different Sr staff, different priorities, etc. Which one has been your favourite and why?

What's been your favourite thing about moderating during these last 2 years?

Opinion?

replies.body:
<33

You're my favorite moderator probably because I've known you for a reeeeally long time.  You're also one of my only friends who hasn't/has barely changed since we met, so that's awesome. Your promotion is long overdue, should've happened at around your 8 month mark to be honest.

Moderating is pretty fun, and this is one of the last things keeping me connected to the server.

Players.

Greatish, school's about to end but geometry is still a pain.

Cakes for sure.

I usually eat just cheese, but I like jalapeños, banana peppers, olives, onions, and other veggies. I never put meat on it.

Never had cactus, lol. Marshmallows.

replies.body:
Thanks!

My favorite time as a staff member was probably back in my first few months when Merlin was a moderator, Iz was still on the team, and there were just so many old users on the team. 

I like having a say in important decisions, although there hasn't been much of that recently.

Your one of the best seniors on the team and your one of my favorites. I didn't like that you were promoted like a day after rejoining the staff team, but now I understand it was for the better. :}

replies.body:
Hi!

I loved being on the team and i believe they're underrated. I hope they don't get screwed over next tourney like they did this time.

I only really know you as an amazing team leader. I'm not sure if you were a leader at the time or whatever, but you were still a great one.

Pizza.

Right.

Spiderman.

replies.body:
You can sometimes be annoying, but other than that I do enjoy talking to you. It has been some time since we've spoken, though.

I don't think I have a best moment. I use to play a LOT back in the day, and I had a massive amount of fun and great plays but I usually spend my time moderating or playing casually now.

replies.body:
A great friend and one of the better moderators. :)

The idea of being able to keep rulebreakers off the server and allow people to play the game without interruptions is a pretty big motivation of mine.

Avicus-wise, I guess when I was falsely demoted for sending some bad emails.

I'm not sure, I've had a lot of good memories.

replies.body: Well, a few weeks prior to your promotion I truly hated that you changed so many things about yourself to become a junior mod, and the minimodding was a bit annoying. But after you passed your trial, I understood that the promotion did help the server wuite a bit considering you're one of the more active in-game moderators. I look at you as a friend, like I did back in the day, although we don't really talk very much. I don't think there really is anything you can improve on since you seem to do everything right and you ask for help when needed. Thank you! :)
replies.body_tagged: Well, a few weeks prior to your promotion I truly hated that you changed so many things about yourself to become a junior mod, and the minimodding was a bit annoying. I look at you as a friend, like I did back in the day, although we don't really talk very much. I don't think there really is anything you can improve on since you seem to do everything right and you ask for help when needed. Thank you! :)

replies.body:
Of course. :>

I only really know you as a an active moderator and one of the nicest guys on the team. Not much else. :}

replies.body:
You're a great friend of mine, and I enjoy the talks we had about real life. I think if you really wanted, you could help restore Avicus's former glory with the skills you have. The only other experience I can think of who has the experience you do is probably Cord.

I'd probably make myself fitt, which I probably could do now but laziness gets the best of me. :>

I'm not as creative as when I was 9 or whatever, so probably something dumb like "my life.".
